response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. It's a unique investment that holds immense value and potential for growth. Given its significance, I believe it deserves a special consideration from you. We are offering this product to you at a price of $950,000, which I hope aligns well with your expectations and budget. This offer reflects our commitment to making high-quality products accessible to discerning buyers like yourself. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial transaction.", "product_price": 950000}
